thread.section_title: New York Marriott Downtown - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent views, friendly staff
thread.title_full: Excellent views, friendly staff - Review of New York Marriott Downtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jennifer B
title: Excellent views, friendly staff
text: From the moment we arrived we felt warm and welcomed from the front desk staff, they were all excellent. Our room was perfect as described- our Hudson River view room was perfect. We were 100% satisfied with our stay. The restaurant inside the hotel (Bull & Burger I think it's called) served an excellent breakfast. We HIGHLY RECOMMEND this hotel when staying in the financial district or when visiting the 9/11 Memorial.
